incoming.page_description.en: Share sensitive information securely with our support team
incoming.page_description.translation: Del følsom information sikkert med vores supportteam

incoming.feature_disabled_description.en: This feature is currently disabled. Please contact support for assistance.
incoming.feature_disabled_description.translation: Denne funktion er i øjeblikket deaktiveret. Kontakt support for hjælp.

incoming.memo_placeholder.translation: Kort beskrivelse (f.eks. Anmodning om nulstilling af adgangskode)

incoming.memo_hint.en: Help us route your message to the right person
incoming.memo_hint.translation: Hjælp os med at dirigere din besked til den rette person

incoming.recipient_aria_label.en: Select a recipient for this secret
incoming.recipient_aria_label.translation: Vælg en modtager til denne hemmelighed

incoming.recipient_hint.en: Choose who will receive this secure message
incoming.recipient_hint.translation: Vælg hvem der skal modtage denne sikre besked

incoming.secret_content_placeholder.en: Paste sensitive information here (passwords, keys, etc.)
incoming.secret_content_placeholder.translation: Indsæt følsom information her (adgangskoder, nøgler osv.)

incoming.secret_content_hint.en: This information will be encrypted and only viewable once
incoming.secret_content_hint.translation: Denne information vil blive krypteret og kun kunne ses én gang

incoming.success_description.en: Your secure message has been delivered.
incoming.success_description.translation: Din sikre besked er blevet leveret.

incoming.success_info_description.en: The recipient will be able to view this secret only once. After they view it, the secret will be permanently deleted.
incoming.success_info_description.translation: Modtageren vil kun kunne se denne hemmelighed én gang. Efter visning vil hemmeligheden blive permanent slettet.

incoming.tagline2.en: Keep passwords and private data out of email and chat logs
incoming.tagline2.translation: Hold adgangskoder og private data væk fra e-mails og chatlogger

incoming.end_of_experience_suggestion.translation: Gem din kvittering til dine optegnelser.
